kb3.name: kb3_comments
kb3.structure: CREATE TABLE `kb3_comments` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `kll_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `comment` text NOT NULL, `name` tinytext NOT NULL, `posttime` timestamp NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `kll_id` (`kll_id`,`posttime`) ) Type=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
